website_summaries.verdict: This compact, intelligently designed sheet-fed scanner almost makes it a pleasure to generate expense reports and calculate itemized income tax deductions.
pros: can export files to Excel, Quicken, Acrobat, and more
helpful, well-written documentation and user tutorials
cons: Software doesn't recognize handwritten or faded receipts
more expensive than a basic flatbed scanner

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner - Saves headaches!
customer_reviews.text: I have used NeatReceipts for several years and this little scanner really does a great job. Doesn't take up much room and after you are thru using it, just unplug it and put it in a drawer for next time. I save my receipts for a couple of weeks and then scan them all at one time. This really helps when tax time comes as many people find out that the receipts you get from the stores are thermal printed and the information on the receipts disappear/fade after awhile and if you can't read them, that's a problem. This scanner along with the NeatReceipts software can save a lot of headaches when compiling your receipts for the year.
customer_reviews.author: R LaValley

customer_reviews.title: very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought this Item but i just got to find out Scanner and software no longer works. Plus i can't find any software online that will work. very disappointing. so people PLEASE do not buy this model.
customer_reviews.author: Rolyn Glenn Louis

customer_reviews.title: Net Scanner
customer_reviews.text: The NEAT scanner itself is cool. Its compact and scans great images. Also the company has great support. The software; however, is horrible unless you are just scanning receipts. Unfortunally, the scanner will not work with other software such as Paperport. If your intent is to scan receipts, then great. If you are going to do general scanning, then there are many many better choices. The Brothers DSmobile 700D is less expensive, will duplex and when combined with Paperport 14, is an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Crenshaw

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!! No customer support!
customer_reviews.text: This product ended up not being compatible with our computer. I tried contacting the Neat company several times and it is almost impossible to speak with anyone, just a bunch of recordings. By the time we figured out this product wouldn’t work for us, they denied our return. So I wasted $125. Not happy at all!! Don’t buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kim B.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but......
customer_reviews.text: Excellent concept & scanner is easy to use and very portable. However, software recognition leaves something to be desired. Recognition of the vendor name is almost nonexistent especially if the name is in any way part of a logo. Something as simple as a Sam's Club receipt is not recognized. Large, page size receipts scan very poorly, and recognition of anything but clear, darkly imprinted receipts is weak or nonexistent. Additionally, creating nonstandard reports or modifying memorized lists is cumbersome. Sometimes "you just can't get there from here" A "training" or "learning" feature for logo's, graphics, or receipt formats would be very helpful. Overall however a useful, time saving, but not perfect, product which is probably worth the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Neumba

customer_reviews.title: Great for tax receipts and anything else
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for years. Really simplies my reciepts for tax time. Easy to install and set up the folders. Useful for those who don't want to purchase a large scanner or for those who travel and need a scanner to go. My husband offered to purchase the Neat Receipts desk top model. I said no as I didn't want another thing on my desk. The mobile scanner tucks away in my desk drawer between uses. Great for those who are downsizing or want something small.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie from Tampa Bay

customer_reviews.title: It was out of date and useless unless I signed up and paid another $40 for ...
customer_reviews.text: It was used and came with no instructions or disks for installations. It was out of date and useless unless I signed up and paid another $40 for a repair kit. When I finally got this working its copying quality was horrible and had lines running through it. Over all I was not happy with this purchase. I would never purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Quickbooks Interface
customer_reviews.text: I bought the device primarily to scan credit card receipts into QuickBooks. Frankly I am very disappointed with the interface to QuickBooks. While it scans and reads the receipts correctly in about 90%+ of the time, once it collects the information, getting that information into the correct Quickbooks accounts is just plainly too difficult to be practical. Instead of giving one a menu of accounts to send the data, it wants to send all the receipts into a single account. That would be fine for a home user putting all charges into a credit card, but it is not sufficient for a business user to have all receipts clumped into a single category.
customer_reviews.author: DrPaper

customer_reviews.title: Great idea - poor execution
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Neat Receipts after reading mostly positive reviews here and elsewhere but have been disappointed. At least 75% of receipts scanned are not "read" completely or improperly, and I end up manually typing everything into the program. Many businesses now use the carbonless receipts and the customer copy is a light yellow with faint imprinting. Neat Receipts will not recognize these types of receipts - I realize they are difficult but are also a large percentage of what I have to work with. Right now it is gathering dust on the shelf as receipts go into a shoe box, just like before. Can you say EBay?
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great electronic file system
customer_reviews.text: Although I can't give this product a perfect five-star rating, it still is worth the investment. I am impressed with the overall accuracy of the OCR capibility and the flexibility of the filing system. The major drawback for me is the lack of full integration with the newer versions of Quicken, which is my main financial management software. It requires several extra steps to transfer all the scanned info and not all the fields that I need in Quicken are available in the scan batch. However the ease of use and the fact that receipt, bsn card and other documents can be stored with a compact device 'on-the-run' compensate for most of the awkwardness.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Fitch

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results with netreceipts
customer_reviews.text: I use my scanner to read every receipt I get, regardless of the size of the receipt. I find it amazing how it can find the total amount, the tax and recognize the issuing business. Of course the first time you scan a receipt from a unique store, you have to enter the name, but after that it recognizes the receipt as being from the proper business. We will be RVing for about 6 months, so the size of the scanner was a big selling point. It is not very fast, but it is very accurate. So far it has done everything it is advertised to do and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cape Coral Bill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Awesome! Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is awesome. I have scanned my tax receipts and had the total right away. As a teacher, I scanned students' work and put it up on the internet. I have scanned important document and put it on a flash drive. I have scanned every single business card I have ever had and tried to find more. This product is so awesome. It is not perfect and will not scan everything perfectly, so check all of the scanner work over. Nothing in this world is perfect. If you hate paper and receipt clutter, let neatreceipt help you out. Buy this product!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Disney Teach

customer_reviews.title: It Does What It Says
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a 'Neat Idea' when my girlfriend told me about hers. However, its pretty slow and it got to be a PITA to submit all my receipts one at a time, etc. so I haven't used it for a long long time. I see they have become more popular and advertised lately-maybe I should re-sell now while they are 'hot' or just use as a mobile scanner/copier Great concept if you have the time and discipline - not me- shoebox or baggies and Excel Spreadsheet for me
customer_reviews.author: M. Leizure

customer_reviews.title: It really shines doing what it says it does!
customer_reviews.text: Im not going into great detail as others have clearly highlighted its Pros and Cons. Overall it works great for a portable scanner. I dont even use it for all the stellar organizational features it has. We simply use it as a scanner of documents on a desk we have very little space on - and it works great! Only thing I wish for is that the storage space in the base that was meant for the USB cord was actually large enough to hold the cable folded up. We cant get it to fit well (at all actually). Its still a 5 star product though.
customer_reviews.author: a_gunslinger

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: It is compact, I can take it with me <fits in my laptop case> Very simple to use. The installation was quick. I also save recipes, now I can scan it and the picture, without having to type so much. It will scan and store 2 sides in color or black & white. For a small business that has alot of receipts to keep or someone who wants to store business cards <not have to keep in a folder & try to remember where it is>. I always have my laptop so my info is immediately stored. Great product. BB
customer_reviews.author: R.R.C.

customer_reviews.title: Massive Productivity Enhancer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after spending way too much time organizing receipts as I prepared my tax return this year. Now, I keep very few paper receipts and simply scan the ones I want to keep and my office is tidier, my receipts are easier to find, and i don't waste two hours each month filing and working with receipts. ditto for my work receipts. Also running all my business cards through this and it is a huge time saver and integrates right into outlook. seriously, this solution is a godsend and i highly recommend it to anyone that is drowning in paper-based receipts.
customer_reviews.author: portolavalley

customer_reviews.title: These devices are short-lived, so don't discard your key paper documents.
customer_reviews.text: This was my third NeatReceipts Scanalizer. In my experience, they have stopped working within a year. Important tip: Do NOT discard your key paper documents because when the NeatReceipt device breaks, your information is no longer retreivable........
customer_reviews.author: Brison Lee

customer_reviews.title: order out of chaos
customer_reviews.text: I read most of the reviews before I purchased this scanner, I agree that the software is a bit slow, and that it isn't perfect on some of the lettering styles and reciept formats. However that being said, I love it. It has done most of the reciepts I have put through with much more accuracy than I was expecting, the variables for modifing lists in the programmng are more than adequate for the needs of our small business and I don't have to handle the reciepts more than once.
customer_reviews.author: LVNative

customer_reviews.title: Great product for many different uses (not just receipts).
customer_reviews.text: I am a consultant and I bought this product for scanning receipts. It does a great job for that, but I have found that it is great for scanning just about anything that you want into a PDF file. I am satisfied with the product, but be certain that you have the recommended memory to run the software. The MS database that it uses is a memory hog. Be cautious of this on upgrades, since each update/upgrade usually requires more memory than the previous one.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: great scanner, highly portable
customer_reviews.text: Great device for cutting down on paper clutter. Main uses for me are receipts (I create a PDF of all receipts from a single trip and zip it with the expense report), for business cards which I sync with Outlook and for general notes -- I never have to worry about having the right paper folder along on a trip. Outlook sync for business cards is great but could map more fields or allow user to adjust the maping. For example, would like to map attachments and back of card (particularly Chinese cards) into Outlook.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Gilmore Jr.

customer_reviews.title: What a great Scanneer
customer_reviews.text: This small scanner is only small in size, not in what it can do. It has made life for me so much easier. I travel each week for my work. Collecting and managing receipts, business contacts and important documents was a real hassle. Now, I just run them through the scanner and Neatreceipts' software organizes all of information for me. It generates reports, allows import and export of the data. It exports to PDF, XLS to name a few formats. Neatreceipts scanner is the best. Wayne A. Glass
customer_reviews.author: Wayne A. Glass

customer_reviews.title: Not enough patience with faulty products
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item the other day. Received it last night. Tried it on a few things and seemed to work ok. Today I used it on several Home Depot and Lowes receipts. I am a contractor and bring home dozens of these receipts each week. Tooooo bad it will not read half of them. They are completely flat and I notice the scanner pulls them in and they slowly begin to rotate a bit. It comes back with errors galore. Waste of time, money, and my patience on this "Professional Scanner". I will be sending this item back. Rather keep my $170 and deal with it come tax time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Keating

customer_reviews.title: Good idea - mediocre implementation
customer_reviews.text: The scanner here is worth about $120; so you're paying about $35 for the NeatReceipts software. That's probably the upper limit of what it's worth right now. It claims to be version 2.5, but feels more like an early beta - slow to load, frequent crashes, poor search function. This is potentially a useful package for compulsive record keepers. Scanner works fine, but software needs more development.
customer_reviews.author: CGP

customer_reviews.title: More than I need
customer_reviews.text: There are so many features associated with this device that I am unlikely to use. If you have a small business, I can imagine how useful the NeatReceipts Scanalizer would be. But for my purposes, it's over the top. I am using it as a straightforward document scanner and not as an accounting device. I'm giving it 5 stars because I don't want to under-rate an untried item.
customer_reviews.author: usuk.bilingual

customer_reviews.title: Rights to ownership
customer_reviews.text: The machine works great (as advertised) my only complaint, (and it is a major one) is that the software rights will always be in your name, the upgrade would not work w/o the original purchaser name (yours/not mine) hence I paid $100 to borrow this scanner not own it. David A. Longe
customer_reviews.author: David A. Longe

customer_reviews.title: Get organized
customer_reviews.text: Overall the Neat scanner is great. The company offers their own software, drivers, and with that software, a great data-base, which can be downloaded FREE online. The only problem is that, without their drivers, and software, the scanner won't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Oden

customer_reviews.title: NeatReceipts Scanalizer
customer_reviews.text: Great product for reducing the sheer mountain of paper a person collects each day/week/month while being able to maintain needed records for personal/tax purposes. The scanner is a nice compact size and handles most receipts easily on the first try, even the ones that have been folded, scrunched, twisted and then straightened out. The only thing I would like it to do, and I haven't figured out how to do it if it can, is maintain the addresses with the vendor names so I don't have to retype in that info each time. The software help menu is okay, but could be a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Books-For-All-Reasons

customer_reviews.title: Handy item but software is slow
customer_reviews.text: The scanner works great but the process is slow. We just got a scanner at work and its easier to scan documents in it and just store the images in folders like a file cabinet. The file system is not easy to navigate and there is no drop and drag ability. For small receitps like from the gas station its easier to scan but then the items are stored in the scanners own format and its not that easy to get them out or export them. If had it to do again would not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Dagg-Murry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: The only fly in the ointment is the fact that this device only really works with Windows XP, and not Mac or Linux, and not very great (as of last month) with Windows Vista. Scans and helps you organize store receipts and business cards, very important items for anyone who likes to really keep track of their or their business finances.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Prall

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I am running this on vista. I am very pleased overall with the product. I am a bit disappointed in the way the receipts are organized. Other than that, very pleased with the product. You can have multiple categories to scan receipts into. I own 4 businesses. I set up all 4 businesses and personal folders and scan all my receipts in. Also I set up folders and scan in important documents. Overall very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Berova

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Helps me get rid of tons of excess ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Helps me get rid of tons of excess paper. Will get the auto-loading one next :)
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: NeatReceipts Scanalizer Pro v2.5
customer_reviews.text: Software works as advertised. Update online added tax categories that I otherwise would have had to have done myself. Hardware also works as advertised. Plug and play. Rotates images as necessary. Very readable. Recognizes about 90% the first time. If you 'correct' as you go, the next time it gets it right. Seems to sometimes have a problem with slashed zeros being recognized as eights - appears to be a function of font size on the receipt.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Stirewalt

customer_reviews.title: still time consuming
customer_reviews.text: It still takes time to scan, correct, categorize (and possibly adjust the image and/or rescan) each receipt. It does organize, and prints up a nice report for you. Wish it had "drag and drop" instead of cut and pasting all the time. Maybe in future versions of the software.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over Rated
customer_reviews.text: "NeatReceipts" Scanalizer is seen at airports and retail shops throughout the country. However, the product is slow, requires extensive input and does not produce the results it advertises. I would recommend a regular scanner and a reasonable filing system. The product is very portable, but for the price, it doesn't accomplish it's goal.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: BEST ORGANIZATIONAL TOOL EVER
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic. I am certain the new one is great as well. Software updates make it better than ever to use. You can't go wrong with this. Does cards too. Great organizational tool.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Scanner and Software don't work.
customer_reviews.text: The software and scanner were 2005 versions that do not work with Windows 64 bit software. I have had to spend much time with tech support. Very cumbersome to uninstall old version before installing the updated version. I had to actually delete files from my system registry AFTER uninstalling through windows. After this was successfully done the scanner still did not work. Contacted tech support again. Had to delete more files in the system registry. Scanner still does not comunicate with the software.
customer_reviews.author: Ben P. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: neat receipts great
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have purchased. One was for myself and the other for a gift. It really does rid you of all those receipts hanging around. I would recommend it. The reports are good as well. It is interesting to see how much you really spend on things when you print up a yearly report by category.
customer_reviews.author: Msoile

customer_reviews.title: An EXCELLENT Product
customer_reviews.text: I am a clutter bug by nature and was drowning in a sea of paper ... for our business we had to have proof... now we can keep that proof on a disk with the help of this scanner and catergorize it as well for quick retrieval. I love this scanner
customer_reviews.author: Little Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: neat receipts
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas in 2012. Still havent figured out how to use it. it instructed me to update windows and still it won't work. So bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Clontz

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time, have wanted to reorganize my office for a long time and this is a great tool.
customer_reviews.author: My Moxie

customer_reviews.title: It dosent work properly!
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked it a lot except that the product I recieved does not scan properly. Half of the scanner does not scan color images and when using black and white documents half the document is darker than the other half. This is right down the middle of the page from top to bottom. I will not be ordering anything from that seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Roy

customer_reviews.title: Organize your desk
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how useful this software/scanner is for keeping my desk in order and tracking expenses and contacts. It takes up so little room. A professional friend told me about it and I'm grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Great receipt organizer
customer_reviews.text: Great price, pretty good organizer. The software is very user friendly. The export options are outstanding (excel, quickbooks, pdfs, and more). The draw backs: Scanning takes longer than what I expected. Also, the software allows folder names to change just by moving the mouse. It becomes a problem as folder names get changed inadvertently.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Pay Attention to the Fine Print
customer_reviews.text: Product is listed as scanner and software. NOTE: Product does NOT come with software!!!! Software should not be in the title of this product whatsoever if it does not come with the software.
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Can't even get it working, wasting a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't even get it working,wasting a lot of time trying to handle driver upgrade,and two weeks later not one response from neatreciepts support
customer_reviews.author: marc wetzel

customer_reviews.title: Has some limitations
customer_reviews.text: Covienent size. Scans ok. Software ok. Had problem scanning an orange receipt. Poor support. Answer was will not scan orange and could not manually enter data.
customer_reviews.author: Wfrankspk

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. It scans so easily and we use it not only for receipts but for business cards and documents. Doesn't always get every character right but for the most part it reads it all!
customer_reviews.author: D. Koeller

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Painful to use. So slow and poor quality results, returned right away.
customer_reviews.author: den

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty easy but needs to be Mac compatible there is a hole other market out there that can use this product with tons of receipts that need to be scanned!
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Rouzaud

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't get it to work at first. The ...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get it to work at first. The Neat tech support helped me get it all set up and it works fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So useful, especailly for the receipts that are heat resistant and eventually can't see the price
customer_reviews.author: ALICIA FASSAS

customer_reviews.title: Great Product !!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't found a better mini scanner on the market. Works great for School applications and work task. And they are completely different in every way.
customer_reviews.author: journeyman65

customer_reviews.title: Never worked properly
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this scanner for several months now. With the original software, the system would produce an error and no-scan about 25% of the time. After an hour or so with a very pleasant customer service rep, we gave up to wait for the upgrade. That came last week and now it won't run at all. Much better systems available.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: hard to insall
customer_reviews.text: After over a week of emailing tech support, I gave up and paid a local computer store to install soft ware. Tech tried to be helpful but didn't have any idea how to do it. When I wrote them and told them it cost me $70 to finally get my product to work, Tech support wrote back "we are so glad to help" they are taking all the credit! ! ! Nothing but trouble.
customer_reviews.author: stanchuk

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Good for quickly storing documents that you scan but takes a long time to scan a receipt then doesn't do that much automated processing but makes you wait a long time for that what little it processes. Can not put receipt items into different categories - whole receipt total goes in one category which isn't practical for me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: Had a little trouble with the setup - had to uninstall and reinstall but after that program works great! The database program is very intuitive. Recommending to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Neat receipt is really "NEAT"
customer_reviews.text: Still working on all the features. One disappointment - my scanner did not come with software. However it was a free download from the company. It looks like it will help with my organization of STUFF. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: JIM CALANDRA

customer_reviews.title: A Neat Way to Keep Receipts
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this product I ordered it right away. I have receipts piling up all year so it is quite nice to put them in the scanner and be done with them. There aren't a lot of instructions with the scanner and I am not too computer saavy, so haven't figured it all out yet. I tried to do a search for a certain receipt and couldn't find it but it may just be me. I'm hoping it will do some sorting rather than just compiling. But it gets five stars from me just for keeping my receipts and adding them up!
customer_reviews.author: Hapcity

customer_reviews.title: Time savings
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, minor problems reading receipts, especially old and faded from early in the year, but overall the time savings for me was worth the somewhat high price for a tiny little scanner. I debated this purchase for months, and now wish I had purchased sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neat Receipts
customer_reviews.text: I love the product it is great. I just wish it had a higer success rate populating fields. But this is a minor nusance.
customer_reviews.author: David Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Neat Product
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of approaches to organizing and reporting my expenses, none of which have been effective. NeatReceipts is. I have found it to be very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Lew Hoff

customer_reviews.title: scanner
customer_reviews.text: This was a older modle of the NetReceipts and I hand to call and get a download before it would work. I find it hard to use.I guess you could say I am not very happy with it...
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: neat
customer_reviews.text: it performs @ a high level. Draw back is the paper feed, doesn't always go in straight as a printer scanner does.
customer_reviews.author: rls_77364

customer_reviews.title: great timesaver
customer_reviews.text: this product is long overdue - a great saver of both time and space - and a great asset to anyone looking to organize and actually run their finances. software could do better at recognizing dates that are written with the month abbreviated instead of numerical and it gets bogged down with receipts that are created with dots - especially useful with thermal receipts that aren't left in the sun - once those fade they become almost impossible to read. all in all and excellent product and value - well done
customer_reviews.author: N. Bletsch

customer_reviews.title: NeatReceipts Is Neat
customer_reviews.text: A friend told me about NeatReceipts. I bought it from Amazon.com and I really like the program. It has more features then I need but is easy to use. All my receipts, bills, whatever are filed electronically. No more desk drawer with bulging hanging file folders!
customer_reviews.author: Barton E. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great Scanner with sub par software
customer_reviews.text: I used this to scan all my receipts. Scanning worked great. Software is ok, even after free update, but the export to excel needs improved.
customer_reviews.author: nhp

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner - software a bit awkward
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is small, portable and awesome! I've been quite pleased with it. I use it to scan documents, convert them to .pdf format, and send in to corporate. The software is a bit awkward but it might be that I haven't invested enough effort to figure it out. Overall, I'd still highly recommend this scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Fred McGee

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Very Satisfied. Reads receipts and business cards quite well. Scans into other applications with no issues. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sean A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Complicated and not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I sent it back. It's just something else to clutter my desk. I have a 3/1 printer that scans just fine!
customer_reviews.author: T. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Neat Scanner not all that
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this scanner. I purchased from Amazon because it was cheaper. The disk that came with the scanner did not work with my Mac, even though I purchased the Mac version. I tried to download software directly from Neat.com, but the product key on the disk I purchased from Amazon did not work with the Neat website. Neat won't provide service since I did not buy it from them. I don't have the box as I am traveling and had to discard, so now I can't return it. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great item - Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: A friend got one and recommended it to me. It scans my receipts, creates a folder, and exports them to a PDF file. It's small and scans a good image.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: found out too late that I really didn't like the system itself. I do not use it.
customer_reviews.author: betty j boeke

customer_reviews.title: Good Scaner, But Does Not Work Well with Quicken
customer_reviews.text: It works as a great scanner and it makes great travel reports from recipts, but it does not work well with quicken.
customer_reviews.author: A. Peer

customer_reviews.title: something that more than what it say's it will do
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. It is well designed and the software is easily navigated without frequently returning to Help to see how to complete a task.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Neat receipts
customer_reviews.text: I had a huge box of receipts that I needed recorded. I purchased Neat Receipts and conveniently scanned them in very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Pharr

customer_reviews.title: Slow scanner and unreliable software
customer_reviews.text: The scanner that comes with this software is not well suited for scanning pages quickly. It crawls through the process. I spent an hour scanning cards and receipts only to find that they all dissappeared the next time I ran the software.
customer_reviews.author: David D

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye paper clutter!
customer_reviews.text: I had boxes of receipts, now I have trash cans full of receipts. Easy setup, easy to organize, easy to scan. An upgrade is on the way, can't wait!
customer_reviews.author: Don F. Stuart

customer_reviews.title: NeatReceipts Scanalizer
customer_reviews.text: Thanks. Before to bay I carefully red the information about this scanner and now I completely satisfied with this product. This is exactly what I need. I already installed it and it perfectly works. Thanks again. Lev.
customer_reviews.author: Lev Bekker

customer_reviews.title: No Bad
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this product when I first bought it. It works fairly well and does help manage paper better - particularly receipts. The software needs some ugrades, and then it will be 5 out 5.
customer_reviews.author: Hockey Nut

product_meta.title: NeatReceipts Scanalizer Professional 2.5 Mobile Scanner and Software
product_meta.description:
A 3.0 software upgrade for the NeatReceipts Scanalizer will be released on October 15, 2007. You may purchase the software upgrade at the NeatReceipts website: Neatreceipts.com/Upgrade. NeatReceipts Version 2.5 Professional is the easiest way for individuals and small businesses to manage expenses, prepare for taxes, create expense reports, and scan business cards. But it not all just for business--you can also use Neat Receipts for scrapbooking, archiving family recipes, and other family activities. NeatReceipts Version 2.5 Professional edition also includes a new Document Organizer feature in addition to Receipts, Business Card, and Tax Organizers features.

AMAZON.COM
Amazon.com Product Description Please note: A 3.0 software upgrade for the NeatReceipts Scanalizer will be released on October 15, 2007. You may purchase the software upgrade at the NeatReceipts website: Neatreceipts.com/Upgrade

 NeatReceipts Version 2.5 Professional is the easiest way for individuals and small businesses to manage expenses, prepare for taxes, create expense reports, and scan business cards. But it not all just for business--you can also use Neat Receipts for scrapbooking, archiving family recipes, and other family activities. NeatReceipts Version 2.5 Professional edition also includes a new Document Organizer feature in addition to Receipts, Business Card, and Tax Organizers features. 

 



Use NeatReceipts 2.5 to manage expenses, prepare for taxes, create expense reports, and scan business cards. View example. 

Organize expenses by IRS form and category. View example. 

Sync contact information into Outlook, Plaxo or vCard. View example. 

Scan receipts and save in digital spreadsheet format. View example. 

Scan documents, recipes, and more and then convert them to PDF. View example. How NeatRecipts can Make Your Life Easier
 Make permanent digital copies of all your financial papers
NeatReceipts 2.5 comes with a high resolution portable scanner. All you have to do is scan your receipts, invoices, and other financial documents through this scanner, and our software will save permanent copies that you can depend on for years to come. 

 Eliminate financial data entry, simplifies expense tracking
Using patent-pending NeatScan technology, NeatReceipts 2.5 extracts all important information from each receipt including date, amount, vendor and payment type. It then organizes all this expense information into a searchable expense database. 

 Speed up tax preparation
NeatReceipts allows you to leave digital comments on receipts and mark them for tax purposes. During tax season, retrieve all the marked receipts with ease and review those comments for easy preparation. NeatReceipts stores each receipt in a secure digital format that is accepted by the IRS. 

 Integrate with QuickBooks, Quicken, Money, Act!, Peachtree
Export to QuickBooks, MS Money, Quicken and most other financial software. By automating data entry and making it easy to export to other software, NeatReceipts makes sure you never have to type information into your financial software again! 

 Scan business cards
NeatReceipts captures key contact information from business cards and syncs with your Outlook address book. You can also create V-cards to upload to your PDA. 

 Automatically create expense reports
Automatically creates expense reports from scanned receipts and attaches images of the original receipts for simple verification. Users can email these reports from within the software or export them into PDF, DOC, XLS or HTML formats. If you are looking for expense reporting software with in-built approval, analysis and administration capabilities, please consider NeatReceipts Enterprise. 

 How NeatReciepts Works

 NeatScan Technology Using advanced Optical Character Recognition, NeatScan technology (patent pending) extracts key information from your receipts, such as date, amount, payment method, expense category and vendor. If you scan in business cards, NeatScan automatically pulls out information like name, company, address, phone numbers, email address etc. 

 NeatScan actually learns to associate an expense category (such as meals or lodging) to a particular vendor (brands such as Starbucks or Hilton) so you don't have to type in the information each time. This ensures that your financial records are filed consistently and with minimal effort.

 Each user of NeatReceipts Professional 2.5 receives the NeatReceipts scanner--a lightweight, portable, durable color scanner. Our software was designed with this scanner in mind and offers the following unmatched functionality: 

 * Auto-sizes any scanned receipt or document. 
 * Auto-crops and auto-rotates any scanned receipt or document. 
 * Scan widthwise or lengthwise -- the image will appear upright in image viewer. 
 * Powered by USB port, so no plug needed (it's truly portable!). 
 * Scans quickly and easily without opening and closing scanner lid (flatbed). 
 * Small, portable and lightweight. Perfect for the office, the home and the road! 

What New with NeatRecipts 2.5 NeatReceipts Professional 2.5 offer many new features like recognition of credit cards by last 4 digits, simplified and enhanced Advanced Fast Find for your folder and receipts, and added printing options that let you print one to four images per page and choice of paper size.

 Just like its previous version, NeatReceipts Professional 2.5 includes a business card reader at no additional charge. Simply scan your business cards and sync your contact information automatically with your Outlook address book, or create a V-Card for your palm pilot. Version 2.5 has the added convenience of Plaxo integration, so you can just go online, click "sync with Plaxo" and have your contact information updated.

 New in business card features in version 2.5 include an improved interface and parsing, both black & white and color scanning, one-click e-mail to and browse-to options, and completed action item check box column.

 Also, for the first time, NeatReceipts Scanalizer Professional Version 2.5 also includes a document organizer so you can keep track of all types of documents and access them up as needed. Document Organizer features include: 

 * Black & White and Color Scanning 
 * Document copier 
 * Copy Document command 
 * Ability to combine documents together 
 * Ability to separate multi-page documents 

What's in the Box
Scanner, carrying case, stand

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
NeatReceipts is the easiest way for individuals and small businesses to manage expenses, prepare for taxes, create expense reports and scan business cards. The NeatReceipts package includes the proprietary NeatReceipts software and a lightweight, color, portable scanner. 

 Features: 

 * Makes permanent digital copies of all your financial papers: NeatReceipts comes with a free, high resolution portable scanner. All you have to do is scan your receipts, invoices and other financial documents through this scanner, and our software will save permanent copies that you can depend on for years to come! 
 * Eliminates financial data entry, simplifies expense tracking: Using patent-pending NeatScan technology, NeatReceipts extracts all important information from each receipt including date, amount, vendor and payment type. It then organizes all this expense information into a searchable expense database. 
 * Speeds up tax preparation: NeatReceipts allows you to leave digital comments on receipts and mark them for tax purposes. During tax season, retrieve all the marked receipts with ease and review those comments for easy preparation. NeatReceipts stores each receipt in a secure digital format that is accepted by the IRS. 
 * Integrates with QuickBooks, Quicken, Money, Act!, Peachtree: Export to QuickBooks, MS Money, Quicken and most other financial software. By automating data entry and making it easy to export to other software, NeatReceipts makes sure you never have to type information into your financial software again! 
 * Scan business cards: NeatReceipts captures key contact information from business cards and syncs with your Outlook address book. You can also create V-cards to upload to your PDA. 
 * Automatically creates expense reports: Automatically creates expense reports from scanned receipts and attaches images of the original receipts for simple verification. Users can email these reports from within the software or export them into PDF, DOC, XLS or HTML formats. If you are looking for expense reporting software with in-built approval, analysis and administration capabilities, please consider NeatReceipts Enterprise. 

 NeatScan Technology Using advanced Optical Character Recognition, NeatScan technology (patent pending) extracts key information from your receipts, such as date, amount, payment method, expense category and vendor. If you scan in business cards, NeatScan automatically pulls out information like name, company, address, phone numbers, email address etc. 

 NeatScan actually learns to associate an expense category (such as meals or lodging) to a particular vendor (brands such as Starbucks or Hilton) so you don't have to type in the information each time. This ensures that your financial records are filed consistently and with minimal effort. 

 The NeatReceipts portable scanner Each user of NeatReceipts Professional receives the NeatReceipts scanner -- a lightweight, portable, durable color scanner. Our software was designed with this scanner in mind and offers the following unmatched functionality: 

 * Auto-sizes any scanned receipt or document. 
 * Auto-crops and auto-rotates any scanned receipt or document. 
 * Scan widthwise or lengthwise -- the image will appear upright in image viewer. 
 * Powered by USB port, so no plug needed (it's truly portable!). 
 * Scans quickly and easily without opening and closing scanner lid (flatbed). 
 * Small, portable and lightweight. Perfect for the office, the home and the road! 

 Links receipt to expense A high resolution image of every receipt is stored right next to its corresponding expense. This makes verification of expense reports a snap! 

 The receipts are stored in a secure digital format, and cannot be edited once scanned in. The IRS accepts our secure digital format and this means you can throw away your tax-related receipts once they are scanned into NeatReceipts. 

 Business Card Reader NeatReceipts Professional now includes a business card reader at no additional charge! Simply scan your business cards and sync your contact information automatically with your Outlook address book, or create a V-Card for your palm pilot. 

 Integrates with QuickBooks. Creates expense reports in PDF, XLS and more NeatReceipts Professional can export all extracted and entered information to: 

 * Intuit QuickBooks 
 * Intuit Quicken 
 * Microsoft Money 
 * Other accounting software (through IIF and CSV formats) 
 * Microsoft Outlook (for business card information) 
 * vCard format compatible with all handhelds (for business card information). 

 In addition, expense reports can be created in a variety of formats, including: 

 * Microsoft Excel (XLS) 
 * Microsoft Word (RTF) 
 * Adobe Acrobat (PDF) 
 * Microsoft Access and other databases (CSV) 
 * Internet Explorer, Mozilla, Netscape (HTML) 

 Advanced search for expense reports, receipts and business cards NeatReceipts has advanced search capabilities that allow you to find expense reports and receipts with any combination of criteria, including: 

 * Time period 
 * Project or Client information 
 * Total amount of expense report, total for any category or expense amount 
 * Expense purpose 
 * Payment class (billable, reimbursable, paid by company, personal, taxable) 
 * Payment type (cash, name of credit card, check) 

 You can also find contact information from scanned business cards in any of the following criteria: 

 * Name 
 * Company and title 
 * Address 
 * Phone or fax number 
 * Email address 
 * ...and much more! 

What's in the Box: Scanner, carrying case, stand.

See more
feature_bullets: Easiest way to manage expenses, prepare for taxes, create expense reports and scan business cards--accepted by the IRS
Scans permanent digital copies of all your financial papers
You can keep track of all types of documents and pull them up as needed with the new Document Organizer feature
Works with QuickBooks, Quicken, MS Money, Excel, PDF, Act!, and Peachtree
Includes NeatReceipts software and a lightweight, color, portable scanner, USB interface
